channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: President Tsai Ing-wen Inspects Earthquake-Hit Hualien
item.description: President Tsai Ing-wen has promised help for earthquake-hit Hualien. The comment came while she was inspecting the area.

item.title: Taiwanese Chipmaker TSMC Reports 16.5% Rise in Q1 Revenue
item.description: Taiwanese chip giant TSMC has reported a 16.5% rise in first quarter revenue — beating market expectations.

item.title: Han Kuo-yu To Lead Democracy Foundation
item.description: The Taiwan Foundation for Democracy has nominated Legislative Speaker Han Kuo-yu as its new chair. The Foundation seeks to expand Taiwan’s participation in the global democracy mov

item.title: Mixed Reactions to Ma-Xi Meeting in China
item.description: Taiwan's former President Ma Ying-jeou has returned from an 11-day trip to China that culminated in a meeting with Chinese leader Xi Jinping. Both made comments referring to "one C
